data.title: Pentair becomes pure-play water company with completion of nVent separation
data.text:
Pentair plc has separated from its Electrical business, and is now a pure-play water company with smart, sustainable water solutions for homes, businesses, industry and communities.

The Electrical business is called nVent Electric plc, a new independent, publicly-traded company. nVent shares will begin trading on the New York Stock Exchange on 1 May 2018, under the symbol NVT

“Pentair is now well positioned to deliver on its strategic initiatives as a pure-play residential and commercial water treatment company focused on our belief that the health of our world depends on reliable access to clean water,” said John Stauch, Pentair president and CEO. “We believe our new focus will better position us to deliver predictable, consistent, and sustainable growth, and that our strong financial position will allow us to invest in attractive growth opportunities that maximize returns for shareholders.”
